TopicTitle: Newbie Challenge: Land that Asteriod at KSC.

Articles.Content:
KSC= Kerbal Space Center.

Create a new Contract game, download and replace the persistent.sfs with this one HERE.

You will find there are a smallest-class-A asteroid orbiting Kerbin at 70x71km.

Your mission is to land that asteroid on KSC.

-Preferably mobile-able after landing. so, you can move it around for publicity.

-Create a story on this event. Preferably with some graphic support.

-Every participant will be listed. There will be NO scoring (its newbie challenge). If you can do it, you ARE the winner.

-Enjoy and have fun.
